column5: First I better excuse myself,  I think I may have blown right by ya C.C an Bly at a certain Muddy trib before I hastily went back to my truck and off to find fishable water. I should have introduced myself LOL....Just realized when I saw your post. Anyways, Finally found some water worth drifting (lots of fuel later)  and caught a mixed bag of fish, Could not get them to touch anything but roe. Lost more than were landed due to the heavy lumber factor in the creek but the lumber is where the Brown was hidden! Heres a few shots of a couple of fish from today.        RF
Nice fish,  Beauty Brown, always a welcome suprise.
NICE WORK BRO!!!! WAS THE JEEP YOU???
No the silver  Xterra was mine, I did the same thing you guys did , Got out looked over the railing of the bridge sighed an coursed and than took off LOL.. RF
Nice fish... I like how you covered up the area in the first pic...tastefully done.
Nice mud shots.  JENOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!

Yep, Guys and gals get a little touchy if its their home creek and hoards of people flock to it due to a post on migratory  bow's. Here today gone tomorrow kinda fish,  at least at this time of year given the allowable fishing zones.  RF
nice brownie!

Great stuff RF!!  I'd have been with CC and Bly today if it wasn't for work and a bad back....details details...LOL.  Great looking Brown too....I have yet to hook into one on a trib.  Keep posting your reports...this is after all a fishing board!!
Keep it up and I'll post the directions to your home water. With pics LOL... Check your email RF
Go for it. Just expect Cactus Jack to break into your house while your fighting fires and steal all your pro plan purchases  .
Looks like a great day on the water Ryan.  Nice post. Just ignore eyeforelle, she's just jealous!
Nice Brown!!!  Too bad we didn't have a chance to chat, maybe next time    Some of that water today was ugly!  lol  Nice that you were able to get a few today!!
Beauty fish.  Gosh I can't wait to get out there.  Joey
nice fish and great pics man, keep it up....how do you like that pack ? I have been considering but they look mighty uncomfortable right in your face like that, NO ?
LOL!!! 'She's just jealous.'  Nice job Ryan. Beauty brown.
LOL,   Roger thats one of our BPS co-workers horsing around, he has hair like girl though!! RY

Pack is OK, it does get in the way a little although I 'll take it any day over my vest. Most days if I can get away with it I 'll just use a waist pack, lighter the better but it all depends on the region your fishing I guess.  RF
I know Ryan.  He/she's one of our finest!!
LOL at Christian's hair.  Nicely done ry.  Thursday ??

O no, my special identity has been reviled!!!! Quick, to the Floating Fortress!!!! I wonder how many pm’s I’m going to get now about people asking me to get special discounts for them? Please kill me.   Damn straight. You know you love me Roger. Which reminds me, I really need to take that pic down from the wall, its getting pretty embarrassing. As for the hair, it will live forever, or at least till someone sneaks into my room at night and cuts it. Till then Cactus Jack says Bang Bang!!  P.S. JENOOOOOOOOO
Nice report and pics!!!
congrats on a good day
